name: In Love: Memories Can't Wait
description:
First Ever! Visual novel-style romance game(dating simulation game) is here! !
The story of romance in this visual novel application comes with beautiful photos & romantic music. The choices/actions you make in the game will determine how the story ends.
Enjoy a new experience beyond simply reading.

Sometimes, life is like a roller coaster.
Who is in charge of your life?
Can you take charge of your own happiness?

This application will allow you to experience the life and romance out of the ordinary.

You just have to decide what kind of man you want to be with.
Most of all, YOUR choices determine how the story ends.
Will you reach a happy ending with the man of your choice?

Be Your Own Heroine In This All-New Romantic Story!

===Story===
As I wake, my head is throbbing and my vision is blurry. It takes me a moment to figure out where I am. I’m lying in a room I’ve never seen before. Where am I? Why am I here? Then, I suddenly realize that an even more crucial question needs to be answered: WHO am I?

I try desperately to remember something - anything at all - but even the tiniest fragment of memory escapes me. Without any idea of who I am or what has happened to me, I feel helpless and scared.

Here they come three beautiful men, each with a face and body that seems to have been sculpted by the gods themselves, enter my life.

Each offers me his help, his body, and his heart.
However, there is something dark at play behind my misfortune.
I need to find out who I am and what has happened to me - but even more importantly, I need to survive.

With so many questions and mysteries surrounding my life, there is only one thing of which I am certain: There is only one man whom I can trust to lead me from the darkness back into the light, and to protect me with his own life.

===Addictive Features===
*The prologue is FREE!: Start the prologue where you can meet three men and then decide with whom you want to be.

*Choose your hero: You can choose one of three men to begin your passionate romance.

*Multiple-ending stories: The choices/actions you make will determine how the story ends. Make the right choices to reach a happy ending with the man you choose.

*Beautiful photos: Imagine reading a story full of beautiful and sensational photos.

*Music: Special background music (BGM) is included to deeply enhance the thrilling romantic story.
